name: eles.bellmanFord
descr: Perform the [Bellman-Ford](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bellman%E2%80%93Ford_algorithm) search algorithm on the elements in the collection. This finds the shortest path from the starting node to all other nodes in the collection.

fields.name: root
fields.descr: The root node (selector or collection) where the search starts.

fields.name: weight: function(edge)
fields.descr: A function that returns the numeric weight for the edge.  The weight indicates the cost of going from one node to another node.  The weight may be positive or negative.

fields.name: directed
fields.descr: A boolean indicating whether the algorithm should only go along edges from source to target (default `false`).
